This [Post](https://www.threads.net/@raytray4/post/DEuga8yxHfP) quote captures my work. I wish I could embed the post.

> I see knowledge work as sophisticated decision making weighing trade
> offs of unpredictable outcomes judged by irrational humans who disagree
> with you and each other.

Our agency has to set up other agencies and individual to do their piece of the puzzle well; the manual can't cover everything and there are often irrational humans involved. When there is disagreement there needs to be negotiation.
